title: Garlic and Onion Harvest -  Cold Climate Gardening

Storing onions in garden wagon
Monitoring curing process of onions

subtasks: Removing dirt from harvested vegetables

tasks.task: Setting up storage for harvested vegetables
subtasks: Positioning wagon in a cool, well-ventilated area

Planning to plant garlic in spring MAINTASK seems too broad. Break into separate tasks.

tasks.task: Gardening in containers and managing crops
Gardening and harvesting onions and garlic

subtasks: The list should include MAINTASKs and corresponding SUBTASKs.

subtasks: Preparing garlic for storage once dry
